document_data.name: Sanborim Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Sanborim Street''' was a corduroy-log paved<ref name=CoS.M" /> street in the upper side of the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].<ref name=CoS.M" />Over the years Sanborim Street has been mislabeled on maps twice. On Map05 of the ''[[City System]]'' accessory, it was labeled as '''Sanborn Street''', and on the city map included in ''[[Waterdeep: Dragon Heist]]'' it was mislabeled as '''Sandorim Street'''.
document_data.Geography: This street emerged southeast from [[Trollkill Street]], then curved and continued down southwest until terminating at [[Phastal Street]].<ref name=CoS.M" />
